name: Sweet Tooth (itch) (Brian Norman)
description:
The original python game was made for a Cobresun game jam in 2015. This remake was made in Godot in 2021.

The background music is: Space Fighter Loop by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4400-space-fighter-loop

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
